import React from 'react' const NewsItem = (props) => { let { title, description, imageurl, newsurl, author, date, source} = props; return (
{source} {imageurl ? : }
{title}...

{description}...

By {author ? author : 'Unknown'} On {new Date(date).toGMTString()}

Read More
) } export default NewsItem
